channel.title: HKG:2318 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in HKG:2318 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ping An Profit Falls as Market Volatility Hurts Returns
item.description: Ping An Insurance (Group) Co.’s profit fell 8.8% in the first half as investment returns were dented by stock market volatility and lower interest rates during China’s economic slowdown.
